content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Maestro CLI API has been adapted so that the same commands can be used to manage resources in EPAM Cloud and external clouds. Only the -r region parameter determines whether the current resource is hosted in EPAM, AWS or Azure.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For example, the command running a virtual machine will have the following format for different virtualization
